remarks: Lemma for ~ pmltpc .  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 1-Jul-2014.)
statement:
pmltpc.1 $e |- ( ph -> F e. ( RR ^pm RR ) ) $.
pmltpc.2 $e |- ( ph -> A C_ dom F ) $.
pmltpc.3 $e |- ( ph -> U e. A ) $.
pmltpc.4 $e |- ( ph -> V e. A ) $.
pmltpc.5 $e |- ( ph -> W e. A ) $.
pmltpc.6 $e |- ( ph -> X e. A ) $.
pmltpc.7 $e |- ( ph -> U <_ V ) $.
pmltpc.8 $e |- ( ph -> W <_ X ) $.
pmltpc.9 $e |- ( ph -> -. ( F ` U ) <_ ( F ` V ) ) $.
pmltpc.10 $e |- ( ph -> -. ( F ` X ) <_ ( F ` W ) ) $.
pmltpclem2 $p |- ( ph -> E. a e. A E. b e. A E. c e. A ( a < b /\ b < c /\ ( ( ( F ` a ) < ( F ` b ) /\ ( F ` c ) < ( F ` b ) ) \/ ( ( F ` b ) < ( F ` a ) /\ ( F ` b ) < ( F ` c ) ) ) ) ) $.
$d A a b c $.
$d F a b c $.
$d U a b c $.
$d V b c $.
$d W a b c $.
$d X b c $.
